attributes.review:
I don’t even know where to start with this review, but I know that I have to warn people. It all started a month ago when my friend decided to prank me by downloading this app. But as soon as this app finished downloading, my phone glitched and shut off. No matter what I tried, I couldn’t get my phone to power back on. It took 10 different Apple stores to get my phone up and running. 
Sitting in a mall parking lot (5 hours from where I live) I unlocked my phone to make several startling discoveries. 
My home screen had somehow became a picture of trump. I went to my gallery to immediately change it, to find that all of my 1,000+ pictures had been altered. Any person that wasn’t white was replaced with a picture of Trump. The worst one was my sorority group picture. Only myself, Becky, Lacey and Donna remained, with Trump replacing the other 94 women. I have nightmares this picture every night. But it didn’t stop there.
I of course had to delete the app immediately, but it wouldn’t let me! Every time that I hit ‘delete’ Will Smith popped up with the Neuralizer and my phone shut off. I know that may sound funny and not that damaging, but...Will Smith...was...WHITE. How could they do the Fresh Prince like that?!? Not knowing what to do, I called my mom. As soon as she picked up on her end, my phone automatically put on a recording that said “This phone call is sponsored and approved by Donald Trump”. Outraged, she hung up on me. I immediately went to text her and my text message was signed with #MAGA. Desperate, I ran back into the mall where the Apple store is and showed them what was going on. The only advice they could give me was to buy a new phone, but I don’t have that kind of money. I decided I’d live with it, that it couldn’t possibly get any worse, right? Wrong. 
When I got home, my apartment was surrounded by birds. I watched as my cat (Mrs. Whiskers) tried to catch one. She was suddenly electrocuted! In horror, I ran to Mrs. Whiskers to see a battery pack in her mouth from the bird! I knew right then that this app had sent spy birds to my home! Mrs. Whiskers is okay, but is now acting strangely. She used to be a Snow White Persian, but is now orange. She spends most of her time staring at walls. For hours I awaited the arrival of my fiancé Daquan from work. I got a notification from my camera system, and saw on the camera that he was at the door. But, it wouldn’t let him in or me out. This app hacked my security system! I’ve been stuck in my apartment for weeks now! But that’s not even the end of it.
All of my social media has been hacked by this app. It unfollowed and deleted any non-Trump supporters. I only have one follower left: my racist, rebel flag flyin, republican, boomer aunt Shelby. 
It even prematurely deleted TikTok!! I fear I will never be able to do the ‘Renegade’ dance again! All this app posts is pictures and videos of Trump on my stories and feed.
But the worst part is that it somehow hacked into my bank account! Every penny I had got funneled into Trump’s presidency campaign and Wall fund. Even my STIMULUS CHECK is GONE!!! 
I can’t even watch TV or streaming services anymore. This app has somehow managed to only allow my media devices to show me only positive Trump related news programs. 
As of today, the app has started a count down timer on my screen with a skull and crossbones. After some quick math, I realized that it is counting down to Election Day... I fear that this means if I don’t vote for Trump, I will die. 
I am so traumatized and sleep is not even an escape anymore. Every time I look in the mirror I swear that I am starting to turn orange.
I fear I’ll never see my friends, family, or fiancé again. That I’ll never be able to escape. All I have left is Mrs. Whiskers. 
Please, DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: Not a GrEat app...
